findings.title: Unchecked transfers in SeriesDeployer.autoCreateSeriesAndBuy
findings.description: Does not use SafeERC20 and does not handle cases where tokens return false on failure conditions

findings.title: WToken Vault has no access controls
findings.description: Assumes the caller is an AMM without checking, leading to potential undefined behavior if called by other parties

findings.title: Missing zero-address checks
findings.description: Multiple places in the system lack zero-address checks, leaving it vulnerable to incorrect input arguments

findings.title: Code layout can be improved
findings.description: Arithmetic operations spanning multiple lines hinder readability

findings.title: Use of semantic values as defaults in enums
findings.description: Solidity enums default to the first option, which can be dangerous if used as state variables

findings.title: Usage of solc optimizer
findings.description: Enabling the solc optimizer may lead to unexpected bugs

findings.title: System is lacking in documentation
findings.description: The system lacks high-level documentation, hindering readability and onboarding

findings.title: Log old values in logs
findings.description: Important state changes only log new values, not old ones

findings.title: MinterAmm.updateVolatilityâ€™s return parameter is never initialized
findings.description: Alice, a developer building on top of Siren, observes the function signature of MinterAmm.updateVolatility and assumes that the function returns some semantically meaningful unsigned integer. However, it returns 0 instead.

findings.title: Unsatifactory function implementation in MinterAmm.claimAllExpiredTokens
findings.description: The claimAllExpiredTokens function has three issues: it uses two loops, relies on Enumerable Set implementation details, and has a dynamic condition in the for loop.

findings.title: Incorrect Inheritance in VolatilityOracle
findings.description: VolatilityOracle inherits from OwnableUpgradeable but is not meant to be upgraded.
